items.sentence: Tom will have to do that even if he doesn\'t want to.
I\'ve already done everything you\'ve asked me to do.
I\'ve already told Tom that I don\'t plan to do that.
Don\'t treat me the same way you would treat a child.
Tom is wearing a different hat than he was yesterday.
Tom left some books for you on that table over there.
Tom probably thought I could help you this afternoon.
Tom lives in one of the best neighborhoods in Boston.
Tom may have missed the bus he was planning to catch.
Tom never seemed to be interested in learning French.
Tom asked Mary to open the window, but she wouldn\'t.
I wanted to fix everything, but I only made it worse.
I was thinking we might want to help Tom financially.
Tom urged Mary to take the job she was being offered.
Tom used the key Mary had given him to open the door.
Tom wouldn\'t be surprised if Mary decided not to go.
Tom\'s dream is to travel around the world with Mary.
Did you get my email yesterday with the instructions?
Did you really think it would be different this time?
Do you think we should just wait and hope it changes?
Do you think you could climb to the top of this tree?
I plan to spend the New Year\'s holiday in Australia.
I wonder whether Tom is actually in Boston right now.
I can\'t believe we\'ve finally finished the project.
I can\'t believe you don\'t think Mary is attractive.
Tom and Mary are both quite overweight, aren\'t they?
Tom and Mary are both usually punctual, aren\'t they?
Tom said that he thought that the room was too small.
Tom tried to talk his way out of the speeding ticket.
Tom is already worried about what\'s going to happen.
I just want some souvenirs to remember this place by.
I just want to see if Tom plans to come to our party.
I knew it was going to hurt Tom, but I did it anyway.
From here, it\'s about three kilometers to the coast.
I wish you could\'ve met Tom when you were in Boston.
I\'d like you to translate this document into French.
Tom missed the opportunity to go to Boston with Mary.
Tom needed some money, so I offered to give him some.
Tom never forgets to call his mother on her birthday.
A person like Tom probably knows how to speak French.
Do you still remember the name of your first teacher?
We provided the flood victims with food and clothing.
We were in the living room when we heard the gunshot.
We would move to a bigger house if we had more money.
When Tom was in the hospital, he read a lot of books.
You didn\'t eat all that chocolate I bought, did you?
You don\'t seem to be as talented as Tom seems to be.
You forgot to tell Tom where to meet us, didn\'t you?
We don\'t yet know if that\'s going to happen or not.
I came here by bus, but I think that I\'ll walk back.
